vk.methods.auth module¶

class vk.methods.auth.Auth(vk: VK, category: str)¶

Bases: vk.methods.base.BaseMethod

async check_phone(phone: str = None, client_id: int = None, client_secret: str = None, auth_by_phone: bool = None)¶

Checks a user’s phone number for correctness. :param phone: Phone number. :param client_id: User ID. :param client_secret: :param auth_by_phone:

async restore(phone: str = None, last_name: str = None)¶

Allows to restore account access using a code received via SMS. ” This method is only available for apps with [vk.com/dev/auth_direct|Direct authorization] access. ” :param phone: User phone number. :param last_name: User last name.
